## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 15,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | To achieve a safety stock of 5,000 units, the player should place an order for 15,000 units (one order of 15,000 units). This will bring the total inventory to 64,552 units.  This will ensure enough units to meet the forecasted demand for the next five days while also allowing for a buffer to account for potential demand variability. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | This recommendation is 5,000 units less than the player's planned purchase. This adjustment is made to minimize unnecessary inventory and achieve a better balance between supply and demand. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 3.4 days                                  |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5.2 days                                  |
| Comments                          |  While the discount for ordering above 15,500 units is tempting, ordering only 15,000 units provides a more conservative approach to inventory management. This strategy minimizes the risk of overstocking, reduces storage and holding costs, and maintains a healthy stock turnover. |
